Html:
Hi, Admin,

Up to now, there are so many Q & A in our Prism forums, I suggest admin to category all the problem, for newers and specialists to easily find the topic. Tag such as Prism V1, V2, SL3 is not accurate, so these days I browsed out Discussions, I found all the questions focus on these points as follow:

1.Event

2.Command

3.SL special Features

3.RegionManager and RegionViewRegistry

4.Module Load

5.Weak reference

6.Communicate with others, like WCF, RIA, 3rd party componments

7.RegionAdapter

8.Behavior

9.Bootstrapper

10.RI

11.MVP patterns

 

Just a simple summury above. And also I think we need a list to show all the valuable questions somewhere.

FYI.

Hi

Thanks for the feedback! In the Prism Knowledge Base you will find some of the useful questions that have been asked in the Prism forums, and some articles and blog posts that might be useful when developing Prism applications. This Knowledge Base is updated with frequency.

Although the current tags might not be the best ones when to search for a particular development topic, you can use the search functionality of the site to suit this purpose.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

Hi, dschenkelman,

Now I am preparing to list all the 700 articles in my blog: http://www.cnblogs.com/Jax/archive/2009/08/03/1537223.html, which will be convienient to the people. These days I actually find some good Q & A(including my answers, ).

And I had also send a email to Blaine.Wastell, but no response. In the letter I discuss the Prism experiences in detail, and also give some simple DEMO to illustrate concept. I think the Prism document is nod so good, so I even give a draft context of the new document.

Additionally, the behavior is so simple and puzzled in Prism V2, I wonder how about it in V3.


Regards
Jianqiang
